summary: Frontend-only testing completed for ZWAP! Coin PWA Routing & Education Layer update. All 20 test cases passed (100%). Features working: wallet-gated navigation, WalletPage with education content, LearnPage with 6 accordion modules, sidebar Learn menu, AboutPage CTA updates, NewsTicker 'Did You Know?' facts, and splash screen conditional routing.
passed_tests: Routing: /dashboard redirects to /wallet when no wallet connected - PASSED
Routing: /move redirects to /wallet when no wallet connected - PASSED
Routing: /play redirects to /wallet when no wallet connected - PASSED
Routing: /shop redirects to /wallet when no wallet connected - PASSED
Routing: /swap redirects to /wallet when no wallet connected - PASSED
Routing: /about is accessible without wallet connection - PASSED
Routing: /learn is accessible without wallet connection - PASSED
WalletPage: Shows 'What Is a Crypto Wallet?' section with explanation from education spine - PASSED
WalletPage: Shows 'Why You Need One' section with 3 bullet points - PASSED
WalletPage: Shows 'Your Keys Stay Yours' privacy assurance - PASSED
WalletPage: Shows 'Want to Learn More?' section with Profile Badge visual hint - PASSED
WalletPage: Learn link navigates to /learn page - PASSED
WalletPage: 'Connect Your Wallet' button exists - PASSED
LearnPage: Shows all 6 education modules (cryptocurrency, blockchain, wallet, zwap, zpts, swap) - PASSED
LearnPage: Modules expand to show core explanation, analogy, did you know, and quick check - PASSED
LearnPage: Back button works correctly - PASSED
AppHeader sidebar: 'Learn' menu item exists between Profile and Contact - PASSED
AppHeader sidebar: Clicking Learn navigates to /learn page - PASSED
AboutPage: CTA shows 'Ready to Bridge Into the Future?' and 'Begin Your Journey' when no wallet - PASSED
AboutPage: CTA shows 'Welcome Back, Zwapper' and 'Back to Dashboard' when wallet connected - PASSED
AboutPage: CTA button routes correctly based on wallet state - PASSED
NewsTicker: Contains 'Did you know?' facts from education modules (verified: blockchain fact shown) - PASSED
Splash screen: ENTER button routes to /wallet when no wallet connected - PASSED
Splash screen: 'WHAT IS ZWAP!?' button routes to /about - PASSED
critical_code_review_comments: Education spine data structure is well-organized in /data/education.js with modules, trivia, and didYouKnow facts
Wallet gate logic in App.js correctly checks walletAddress from context for protected routes
WalletPage correctly imports walletModule from education spine for content
NewsTicker correctly imports allDidYouKnow from education spine
LearnPage accordion modules work correctly with expand/collapse functionality
AppHeader sidebar correctly positions Learn between Profile and Contact
AboutPage CTA correctly shows different messaging based on wallet connection state
All data-testid attributes properly implemented for testing
test_credentials: No credentials needed - localStorage 'zwap_wallet' used for wallet state simulation
seed_data_creation: None - all education content is static frontend data in /data/education.js

mocked_apis.note: All education content is static frontend data, no backend APIs modified

context_for_next_testing_agent: Frontend routing and education layer feature fully tested. Key components: 1) WalletPage at /wallet with education content from walletModule 2) LearnPage at /learn with 6 accordion modules from educationModules 3) Wallet gate in App.js protects /dashboard, /move, /play, /shop, /swap 4) /about and /learn are public routes 5) NewsTicker shows 'Did you know?' facts from allDidYouKnow 6) Sidebar has Learn item between Profile and Contact 7) AboutPage CTA text/button changes based on wallet state
